title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2H.103 - New York National Heritage Signs (NYI12-8)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2H.103 - New York National Heritage Signs (NYI12-8)

State Regulations

Option: 01 New York National Heritage (NYI12-8) signs (see Sign

Drawing SD-G25) may be used to provide information to motorists about the
locations of the boundaries of areas designated by the United States Congress
as National Heritage Areas. Standard: 02 The designs of all logos used on New York National

Heritage signs shall be subject to the review and approval of the New York

State Department of Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2H.103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
